cn.title: 比特派钱包关于 BSV 创世纪升级的相关公告

message.data: 由于 BSV 将进行“Genesis”创世升级（区块高度达到620538时，预计于2020年2月4日），为保障您的资产安全，升级期间将暂停派银行内 BSV 币种的充提及 BSV 的一键买卖服务，相关服务将在升级稳定后第一时间恢复。
BSV 在钱包中的收款、转账功能不受影响，其他币种的所有功能均不受影响。

BSV will perform a “Genesis” upgrade (when the block height reaches 620538, it’s expected to be February 4, 2020). To ensure the safety of your assets, the Deposit/Withdrawal of PieBank and Buy/Sell of BSV function will be suspended during the upgrade.
All related services will resume as soon as the upgrade is finished.
Receive and Transfer of BSV will not be affected.
